user_input: Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.', select the appropriate data sources and parameters for generating hourly demand profiles.
Based on the user's request to split the nodes, identify and select the relevant nodes for splitting.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly demand profiles into TST format for the TYNDP 2026 scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to convert the profiles to TST format, select the generated demand profiles for conversion.
